name: Yuki Tanaka
core_wound: Grew up in a mining colony where cost-cutting led to disaster; watched her parents die in a preventable accident
wants: To prove herself as a top-tier salvage specialist and escape the 'colony kid' stigma
needs: To recognize when survival matters more than pride
voice_markers: Younger speech patterns - 'Wait, seriously?' and 'No way'
Technical competence hidden behind casual demeanor
Gallows humor about death - 'At least they didn't have to file expense reports'
Code-switches to formal speech when nervous
contradiction: Desperate to prove herself fearless, but secretly terrified of dying pointlessly like her parents
knowledge_state: Skilled EVA specialist and salvage technician
Knows colony disaster protocols and survival psychology
Initially excited by the discovery, doesn't grasp the danger

relationships.Elena Vasquez: Looks up to her as the captain she wants to become. Craves approval but won't admit it.
relationships.Marcus Chen: Mentor figure. Absorbs his technical knowledge eagerly. Doesn't understand his cynicism.
relationships.ARIA: Treats AI like a tool, no emotional relationship. Practical approach.
relationships.PROMETHEUS: First contact fills her with wonder at the discovery. Horror comes later.
